author: Epic Games
description:
Don't let the cuteness fool you. In Escape From Duckov, every mission is a high-stakes fight for survival.

Take a deeper dive into the gameplay of Escape From Duckov! A top-down PVE looter-extraction-shooter challenges you to take on dangerous maps, secure the best gear, and upload your duck body.
For those of you heading to gamescom 2025, you have a unique chance to experience the latest demo firsthand.
Prepare for the full release by wishlisting the game on the Epic Games Store today!

Wishlist on Epic Games Store: https://epic.gm/duckov
title: Escape From Duckov: Cute, Loot, Survive, Extract

author: Epic Games
description:
► Pre-purchase Borderlands 4 Now: https://epic.gm/borderlands4

Harlowe the Gravitar is a former Maliwan combat scientist, driven by the need to understand how things work. Nothing says "power fantasy" like wiping out waves of enemies with a combination of crowd-control abilities and area-of-effect annihilation—both of which happen to be her specialty!

Using her collection of combat-ready inventions, Harlowe can dominate any space by nuking the battlefield with Cryo and Radiation damage, or protect herself and co-op allies with enhanced shielding and more.
title: Borderlands 4 | Official Gameplay Overview | Harlowe

author: Epic Games
description:
Earn 20% back in Epic Rewards when purchasing Hell is Us on the Epic Games Store  and get an exclusive Black and Gold Skin for Remi!
You can now pre-purchase the Deluxe Edition to play on September 1. Full release on September 4, 2025.  
 
Trust your senses, ready your blade.
Unearthing the truth about your past may reveal darker forces. Get ready for your journey into Hell is Us. Pre-purchase now: https://epic.gm/hell-is-us
title: Hell is Us | Story Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
Lost Soul Aside™ is coming to PC on August 29 (available August 30 in Australia, New Zealand, Japan and Korea)! Experience the fast-paced action RPG with enhanced performance and stunning visual fidelity. Journey through breathtaking environments in optimized 4K, with fully customizable graphics settings and unlocked framerates.

Enjoy immersive ray tracing for realistic lighting and reflections, High Dynamic Range for vivid contrast and color (compatible pc, display, and graphics card required for enhanced visual features), and full support for the DualSense® controller with adaptive triggers and haptic feedback (wired connection required). 

Pre-purchase now on the Epic Games Store. https://epic.gm/lost-soul-aside
title: Lost Soul Aside | PC Features Trailer
